author: Howard Bamber
comment: I want to test the battery drain of Watchmaker and this is very like one i made. That's the only reason I paid for this. It should be free. Far far better are. title: I've made better on watchmaker..

author: perry farmer
comment: Keeps disappearing from Watch and Phone. Magically started to work. Seems like it would be more logical for this to have a 12 hour clock that follows the tick marks for the regular time as well as UTC, at least as an option.

reply.author: BonySoft
reply.content:
Support for nonstandard timezones (like the one for Nepal) has been added in version 1.2.0.
In order to select the timezone please open the phone configuration companion app, select the Timetraveler GMT watchface and then click on the settings gear icon. 
From there you can change the second timezone, including the one for Nepal

title: Finally got it to stick on watch and phone

author: John Valentine
comment: On my G watch, the settings only allow me to change colors.  There is no setting available to change the secondary time zone.

reply.author: BonySoft
reply.content: Dear user, from the watch it's only possible to change the color. In order to change the second timezone please open the Wear companion app from the phone, select Timetraveler GMT and click on the gear icon. From there you can change both the color and the second timezone. Please let me know if you need more details.
